text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Trainer, are there matters that you wanted to discuss? ……My condition?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Body temperature: normal. Weight: no changes. Appetite: okay. Training is going according to schedule.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: As of now, I am on standby until the next training session. Therefore I can accept additional instructions ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— Too lengthy? I see…… Well, in short, I'm doing fine.
